LanguageData.TileSandstone.label: sandstone tile
LanguageData.TileSandstone.Description: Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.TileGranite.label: granite tile
LanguageData.TileGranite.Description: Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.

LanguageData.TileMarble.label: marble tile
LanguageData.TileMarble.Description: Refined, carefully-cut stone tiles for a castle feeling. Pretty to look at, but they take a long time to lay.
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.label: sandstone flagstone
LanguageData.FlagstoneSandstone.Description: Roughly-cut stone tiles. Not super pretty, but they make good surfaces for roads and outdoor walkways.
